segments.source_content:
---
slug: /117
title: "This Week In React #117: React criticism, useEvent, Next.js, Remix, Gatsby, Expo, Storybook, Ignite, React-Native, TypeScript, Qwik..."
authors: [slorber]
date: 09-27-2022
---
Hi everyone!
This week we have some interesting React criticisms to read.

translations.fr: Cette semaine, nous avons des critiques intéressantes de React à lire.
translations.en: Cette semaine, nous avons des critiques intéressantes de React à lire.
translations.zh-hans: 本周我们有一些有趣的React批评文章值得一读。

segments.source_content: We also have various interesting routing-related news: Next.js, React-Router, Expo...

translations.fr: Nous avons également diverses nouvelles intéressantes sur le routage : Next.js, React-Router, Expo...
translations.en: Nous avons également diverses nouvelles intéressantes sur le routage : Next.js, React-Router, Expo...
translations.zh-hans: 我们还有各种关于路由的有趣消息：Next.js、React-Router、Expo...

segments.source_content: The newsletter **is finally back to its usual weekly rhythm**! I'm just back from vacations, and I took the opportunity to change my email provider: I'm now using [ConvertKit](https://thisweekinreact.com/ck). This gives me more flexibility on the email rendering and will allow me to introduce some new features later ;)

translations.fr: La newsletter **est enfin de retour à son rythme hebdomadaire habituel** ! Je reviens tout juste de vacances, et j'en ai profité pour changer de fournisseur d'email : j'utilise désormais [ConvertKit](https://thisweekinreact.com/ck). Cela me donne plus de flexibilité sur le rendu des emails et me permettra d'introduire de nouvelles fonctionnalités plus tard ;)
translations.en: La newsletter **est enfin de retour à son rythme hebdomadaire habituel** ! Je reviens tout juste de vacances, et j'en ai profité pour changer mon fournisseur d'email : j'utilise désormais [ConvertKit](https://thisweekinreact.com/ck). Cela me donne plus de flexibilité sur le rendu des emails et me permettra d'introduire de nouvelles fonctionnalités plus tard ;)
translations.zh-hans: 本通讯**终于恢复到了每周的常规节奏**！我刚休假回来，并借此机会更换了电子邮件提供商：我现在使用[ConvertKit](https://thisweekinreact.com/ck)。这使我在邮件渲染方面拥有更大的灵活性，并允许我稍后引入一些新功能 ;)

segments.source_content: Use Storyblok React SDK to quickly build reusable components and fetch the content to create your React, Next.js, Remix, or even React-Native applications, websites or eCommerces.

translations.fr: Utilisez le SDK React de Storyblok pour créer rapidement des composants réutilisables et récupérer le contenu afin de créer vos applications React, Next.js, Remix ou même React-Native, sites web ou e-commerces.

segments.source_content: ## ⚛️ React {#react}
**[React I Love You, But You're Bringing Me Down](https://marmelab.com/blog/2022/09/20/react-i-love-you.html)**

translations.fr: **[React I Love You, But You're Bringing Me Down](https://marmelab.com/blog/2022/09/20/react-i-love-you.html)**
translations.en: **[React I Love You, But You're Bringing Me Down](https://marmelab.com/blog/2022/09/20/react-i-love-you.html)**

segments.source_content: The author of React-Admin gives a fair criticism of React on many aspects (forms, useContextSelector, refs, deps array...). Don't miss [Dan Abramov's response](https://twitter.com/dan_abramov/status/1572590212647391235).

translations.fr: L'auteur de React-Admin formule une critique équitable de React sur de nombreux aspects (formulaires, useContextSelector, refs, tableau de dépendances...). Ne manquez pas [la réponse de Dan Abramov](https://twitter.com/dan_abramov/status/1572590212647391235).
translations.en: L'auteur de React-Admin donne une critique équitable de React sur de nombreux aspects (formulaires, useContextSelector, refs, tableau de dépendances...). Ne manquez pas la [réponse de Dan Abramov](https://twitter.com/dan_abramov/status/1572590212647391235).
translations.zh-hans: React-Admin的作者从多个方面（表单、useContextSelector、refs、依赖数组等）对React提出了中肯的批评。不要错过[Dan Abramov的回应](https://twitter.com/dan_abramov/status/1572590212647391235)。

segments.source_content: **[Next.js Layouts RFC in 5 minutes](https://vercel.com/blog/next-js-layouts-rfc-in-5-minutes)**

The file-system based Next.js router will be significantly upgraded in the next major release. It includes support for nested layouts (like in Remix). This allows to avoid unnecessary unmount/remount of a layout during browsing, but also to manage data loading and errors. This article gives a quick overview. See also [Delba's thread](https://twitter.com/delba_oliveira/status/1568291558776274945).

translations.fr: Le routeur Next.js basé sur le système de fichiers sera considérablement amélioré dans la prochaine version majeure. Il inclut le support des layouts imbriqués (comme dans Remix). Cela permet d'éviter le démontage/remontage inutile d'un layout pendant la navigation, mais aussi de gérer le chargement des données et les erreurs. Cet article donne un aperçu rapide. Voir aussi [le thread de Delba](https://twitter.com/delba_oliveira/status/1568291558776274945).
translations.en: Le routeur Next.js basé sur le système de fichiers sera considérablement amélioré dans la prochaine version majeure. Il inclut le support des mises en page imbriquées (comme dans Remix). Cela permet d'éviter le démontage/remontage inutile d'une mise en page lors de la navigation, mais aussi de gérer le chargement des données et les erreurs. Cet article donne un aperçu rapide. Voir aussi le [fil de Delba](https://twitter.com/delba_oliveira/status/1568291558776274945).
translations.zh-hans: 基于文件系统的Next.js路由器将在下一个主要版本中大幅升级。它包含对嵌套布局（类似Remix）的支持，可避免浏览时不必要的布局卸载/重挂载，同时管理数据加载和错误处理。本文提供了快速概述。另见[Delba的推文](https://twitter.com/delba_oliveira/status/1568291558776274945)。

segments.source_content: **[React Router 6.4](https://remix.run/blog/react-router-v6.4)**
Big update: as expected, many Remix APIs (data-loading, mutation...) have finally been moved to React-Router. See the [2min video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aX74DbFT5nI)

translations.fr: Grosse mise à jour : comme prévu, de nombreuses API Remix (chargement de données, mutations...) ont finalement été intégrées à React-Router. Voir la [vidéo de 2min](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aX74DbFT5nI)
translations.en: Grosse mise à jour : comme prévu, de nombreuses API de Remix (chargement de données, mutation...) ont finalement été déplacées vers React-Router. Regardez la [vidéo de 2min](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aX74DbFT5nI).
translations.zh-hans: 重大更新：正如预期，许多Remix API（数据加载、变更等）最终迁移到了React-Router。观看[2分钟视频](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aX74DbFT5nI)

segments.source_content: **[What’s New In Gatsby 2022?](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2022/09/new-gatsby-2022/)**

Paul upgraded his blog to the latest Gatsby v4 version and shares with us how he used the latest features. Deferred Static Generation can significantly reduce build time. See also [Gatsby 5 Umbrella Discussion](https://github.com/gatsbyjs/gatsby/discussions/36609) and the video [Gatsby v5 Alpha Showcase](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C-WrnfUm33k): partial hydration is coming!

translations.fr: Paul a mis à jour son blog vers la dernière version Gatsby v4 et partage comment il a utilisé les nouvelles fonctionnalités. La Génération Statique Différée peut réduire significativement le temps de build. Voir aussi [Gatsby 5 Umbrella Discussion](https://github.com/gatsbyjs/gatsby/discussions/36609) et la vidéo [Gatsby v5 Alpha Showcase](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C-WrnfUm33k) : l'hydratation partielle arrive !
translations.en: Paul a mis à jour son blog vers la dernière version Gatsby v4 et partage avec nous comment il a utilisé les dernières fonctionnalités. La Génération Statique Différée peut réduire considérablement le temps de build. Voir aussi la [Discussion Umbrella Gatsby 5](https://github.com/gatsbyjs/gatsby/discussions/36609) et la vidéo [Gatsby v5 Alpha Showcase](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C-WrnfUm33k) : l'hydratation partielle arrive !
translations.zh-hans: Paul将其博客升级至最新Gatsby v4版本，并分享了使用最新功能的经验。延迟静态生成可显著减少构建时间。另见[Gatsby 5总体讨论](https://github.com/gatsbyjs/gatsby/discussions/36609)和视频[Gatsby v5 Alpha展示](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C-WrnfUm33k)：部分水合即将到来！

segments.source_content: **Extras**:

- 🧑‍🎓Beta docs: [useCallback](https://twitter.com/dan_abramov/status/1570021510659579904) + [useMemo](https://twitter.com/dan_abramov/status/1568602727147520000)
- 💬 [useEvent update](https://github.com/reactjs/rfcs/pull/220#issuecomment-1259938816): the `useEvent` prototype is implemented and available via `@experimental`. Some concerns will lead to the opening of a new RFC. If I understand correctly it is possible that this hook will never be released but another solution will be adopted.
- 💬 [Dan Abramov - "in what ways is react 18 faster than react 17?"](https://www.reddit.com/r/reactjs/comments/xmr9tg/comment/ippsuin/)
- 📜 [The new wave of Javascript web frameworks](https://frontendmastery.com/posts/the-new-wave-of-javascript-web-frameworks/): a good overview of the frontend ecosystem of Flash until today. Focus on React and its various challengers: Vue, Svelte, Solid, Qwik, Astro, Fresh...
- 📜 [Get in Zoomer, We're Saving React](https://acko.net/blog/get-in-zoomer-we-re-saving-react/): article with interesting ideas. I didn't quite understand what the conclusion is except that React can do better and its challengers don't really improve things 😅
- 📜 [useState with URLs: How to persist state with useSearchParams](https://blog.logrocket.com/use-state-url-persist-state-usesearchparams/): explains how and why to persist React state in querystring
- 📜 [An apparent React bug](https://phelipetls.github.io/posts/surprising-react-bug/): related to behavior of the `<details>` element
- 📜 [When to use “useImperativeHandle” and “forwardRefs” in React 18](https://betterprogramming.pub/when-to-use-useimperativehandle-and-forwardrefs-in-react-18-89cce42b3309)
- 📜 [I18n with Storybook](https://storybook.js.org/blog/internationalize-components-with-storybook/): shows how to bring full i18n support in Storybook: locale dropdown switch, RTL support...
- 📜 [Storybook community showcase #3](https://storybook.js.org/blog/community-showcase-3/)
- 📜 [The Basics of Remix](https://css-tricks.com/the-basics-of-remix/)
- 📜 [React and Observables from RxDB](https://www.sabre.com/locations/poland/react-and-observables-from-rxdb/)
- 📜 [Automated Rule Docs With Docusaurus and Remark](https://typescript-eslint.io/blog/automated-rule-docs-with-docusaurus-and-remark/)
- 📜 [Me & React: 5 Years in 15 Minutes](https://valeriavg.dev/me-and-react-5-years-in-15-minutes)
- 🐦 [Mitosis - Write components with Sveltejs syntax, compile to other frameworks d](https://twitter.com/Steve8708/status/1573444026006585345)
- 🎥 React Finland [day 1](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zE8PDM_7xoQ) + [day 2](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rHjwZu0EmlQ)
- 🎥 [5 Pro-Level React Do's & Don'ts](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4FhJkX18fS8)
- 🎥 [freeCodeCamp - Code a Minecraft Clone with JavaScript, React, Three.js](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qpOZup_3P_A)
- 🐦 [React is focused on the problems that matter more](https://twitter.com/heyImMapleLeaf/status/1567960223759093760): interesting conversations. See also [Evan You](https://twitter.com/youyuxi/status/1569485243077529602) comment.
- 🐦 [React form without useState](https://twitter.com/DavidKPiano/status/1569361453928300545)
- 🚧 [MUI Base: the headless alternative to Material UI](https://twitter.com/MUI_hq/status/1570695041034731520)
- 🎙️ [JS Party #244 - The spicy React debate show 🌶️](https://changelog.com/jsparty/244)
- 📦 [Its fine](https://github.com/pmndrs/its-fine): a collection of advanced escape hatches for React. Useful for [bridging React context between renderers in the React-Three-Fiber ecosystem](https://twitter.com/0xca0a/status/1573064826339094528)
- 📦 [Theatre.js v0.5](https://www.theatrejs.com/blog/theatre-05-is-out): new 3D editor, useful for React-Three-Fiber
- 📦 [TinyBase 2.0](https://twitter.com/tinybasejs/status/1570864399728136193): reactive datastore with React bindings
- 📦 [React-Tether 3.0](https://github.com/danreeves/react-tether/releases/tag/v3.0.0): one of the very first positioning libs for React seems to be back in business
- 📦 [TanStack Query 4.4](https://github.com/TanStack/query/releases/tag/v4.4.0): decoupled from React, brings the support of another framework: SolidJS.
- 🥳️ [Next.js merged 10000 pull-requests](https://twitter.com/github/status/1574750716966498304)
<SubscribeFormEmbed />
## 📱 React-Native {#react-native}
**[RFC: File System-Based Native Routing with Expo and React Native](https://blog.expo.dev/rfc-file-system-based-routing-in-react-native-7a35474722a)**

translations.fr: **[RFC : Routage natif basé sur le système de fichiers avec Expo et React Native](https://blog.expo.dev/rfc-file-system-based-routing-in-react-native-7a35474722a)**
translations.en: **[RFC : Routage natif basé sur le système de fichiers avec Expo et React Native](https://blog.expo.dev/rfc-file-system-based-routing-in-react-native-7a35474722a)**
translations.zh-hans: **[RFC：基于文件系统的原生路由（Expo 与 React Native）](https://blog.expo.dev/rfc-file-system-based-routing-in-react-native-7a35474722a)**

segments.source_content: Evan Bacon is working on a new Expo router based on file-system conventions, similar to Next.js or Remix. He tells us all we need to know about this highly anticipated feature that brings the DX of the web to mobile. This should considerably reduce the boilerplate of our apps, but also improve discoverability, deep linking, indexing, loading data, error handling... See also this [thread](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1574837248029331495) and this [podcast](https://podrocket.logrocket.com/expo-router).

translations.fr: Evan Bacon travaille sur un nouveau routeur Expo basé sur des conventions de système de fichiers, similaire à Next.js ou Remix. Il nous explique tout ce qu'il faut savoir sur cette fonctionnalité très attendue qui apporte la DX du web au mobile. Cela devrait considérablement réduire le code récurrent de nos applications, mais aussi améliorer la découvrabilité, le deep linking, l'indexation, le chargement des données, la gestion des erreurs... Voir aussi ce [thread](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1574837248029331495) et ce [podcast](https://podrocket.logrocket.com/expo-router).
translations.en: Evan Bacon travaille sur un nouveau routeur Expo basé sur des conventions de système de fichiers, similaire à Next.js ou Remix. Il nous explique tout ce qu'il faut savoir sur cette fonctionnalité très attendue qui apporte la DX (Developer Experience) du web au mobile. Cela devrait considérablement réduire le code récurrent de nos applications, mais aussi améliorer la découvrabilité, le deep linking, l'indexation, le chargement des données, la gestion des erreurs... Voir aussi ce [thread](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1574837248029331495) et ce [podcast](https://podrocket.logrocket.com/expo-router).
translations.zh-hans: Evan Bacon 正在开发基于文件系统约定的新型 Expo 路由器，类似于 Next.js 或 Remix。他详细介绍了这一备受期待的功能，该功能将 Web 开发体验（DX）引入移动端。这将显著减少应用的样板代码，同时提升可发现性、深度链接、索引、数据加载和错误处理能力。另请参阅此[讨论串](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1574837248029331495)和此[播客](https://podrocket.logrocket.com/expo-router)。

segments.source_content:
- 📦 [Announcing Ignite 8.0: "Maverick"](https://shift.infinite.red/announcing-ignite-8-0-maverick-fbbdafbb738e). InfiniteRed's popular React-Native boilerplate gets a nice update. Many improvements: unification Expo/Vanilla RN, redesign, i18n...
- 📦 [FlashList 1.3 - MasonryFlashList](https://twitter.com/naqvitalha/status/1574416547426496513): to reproduce a grid layout in React-Native, similar to Masonry/Pinterest
- 🥳️ [TypeScripts types have been internalized in v0.71](https://twitter.com/thymikee/status/1572132314280300546). No more need for `@types/react-native`.
- 🥳️ [React-Native reach 1M downloads/week](https://twitter.com/thymikee/status/1574441040626552832)
- 🐦 [0.70: notable improvement in stacktraces](https://twitter.com/thymikee/status/1568257655323475972)
- 🎨 [Amazon Interactive Video Service demo](https://twitter.com/nightstomp/status/1572576326934208513): React-Native more performant than TikTok?
- 🎨 [Software Mansion - Shared Element Transition + Reanimated sneak peek demo](https://twitter.com/swmansion/status/1572246971829608449)
- 📜 [Testing React Native WebView with React Native Testing Library](https://coolsoftware.dev/testing-react-native-webview-with-react-native-testing-library/)
- 🎙 [The React Native Show #16 - React Native at Microsoft](https://www.callstack.com/podcasts/react-native-at-microsoft-ep-16)
- 🎙 [React-Native-Radio #247 - Revisiting common complaints about React Native 5 years later](https://reactnativeradio.com/episodes/rnr-247-revisiting-common-complaints-about-react-native-5-years-later-interview-with-hodeem)
- 🔗️ [There's a Snack for That](https://www.snackforthat.com/): Expo Snacks collection

translations.fr:
- 📦 [Annonce d'Ignite 8.0 : "Maverick"](https://shift.infinite.red/announcing-ignite-8-0-maverick-fbbdafbb738e). Le boilerplate React-Native populaire d'InfiniteRed reçoit une belle mise à jour. De nombreuses améliorations : unification Expo/React Native Vanilla, redesign, i18n...
- 📦 [FlashList 1.3 - MasonryFlashList](https://twitter.com/naqvitalha/status/1574416547426496513) : pour reproduire une disposition en grille dans React-Native, similaire à Masonry/Pinterest
- 🥳️ [Les types TypeScript ont été internalisés dans la v0.71](https://twitter.com/thymikee/status/1572132314280300546). Plus besoin de `@types/react-native`.
- 🥳️ [React-Native atteint 1 million de téléchargements/semaine](https://twitter.com/thymikee/status/1574441040626552832)
- 🐦 [0.70 : amélioration notable des stacktraces](https://twitter.com/thymikee/status/1568257655323475972)
- 🎨 [Démonstration Amazon Interactive Video Service](https://twitter.com/nightstomp/status/1572576326934208513) : React-Native plus performant que TikTok ?
- 🎨 [Software Mansion - Démo en avant-première de Shared Element Transition + Reanimated](https://twitter.com/swmansion/status/1572246971829608449)
- 📜 [Tester React Native WebView avec React Native Testing Library](https://coolsoftware.dev/testing-react-native-webview-with-react-native-testing-library/)
- 🎙 [The React Native Show #16 - React Native chez Microsoft](https://www.callstack.com/podcasts/react-native-at-microsoft-ep-16)
- 🎙 [React-Native-Radio #247 - Revisiter les plaintes courantes sur React Native 5 ans plus tard](https://reactnativeradio.com/episodes/rnr-247-revisiting-common-complaints-about-react-native-5-years-later-interview-with-hodeem)
- 🔗️ [Il y a un Snack pour ça](https://www.snackforthat.com/) : collection Expo Snacks
translations.en:
- 📦 [Annonce d'Ignite 8.0 : "Maverick"](https://shift.infinite.red/announcing-ignite-8-0-maverick-fbbdafbb738e). Le boilerplate React-Native populaire d'InfiniteRed reçoit une belle mise à jour. De nombreuses améliorations : unification Expo/RN Vanilla, redesign, i18n...
- 📦 [FlashList 1.3 - MasonryFlashList](https://twitter.com/naqvitalha/status/1574416547426496513) : pour reproduire une disposition en grille dans React-Native, similaire à Masonry/Pinterest
- 🥳️ [Les types TypeScript ont été internalisés dans la v0.71](https://twitter.com/thymikee/status/1572132314280300546). Plus besoin de `@types/react-native`.
- 🥳️ [React-Native atteint 1 million de téléchargements/semaine](https://twitter.com/thymikee/status/1574441040626552832)
- 🐦 [0.70 : amélioration notable des stacktraces](https://twitter.com/thymikee/status/1568257655323475972)
- 🎨 [Démo d'Amazon Interactive Video Service](https://twitter.com/nightstomp/status/1572576326934208513) : React-Native plus performant que TikTok ?
- 🎨 [Software Mansion - Démo en avant-première de Shared Element Transition + Reanimated](https://twitter.com/swmansion/status/1572246971829608449)

- 🔗️ [There's a Snack for That](https://www.snackforthat.com/) : collection de Snacks Expo
translations.zh-hans:
- 📦 [Ignite 8.0: "Maverick" 发布公告](https://shift.infinite.red/announcing-ignite-8-0-maverick-fbbdafbb738e)。InfiniteRed 热门的 React Native 样板项目迎来重要更新，包含多项改进：统一 Expo/Vanilla RN 支持、重新设计、国际化...
- 📦 [FlashList 1.3 - MasonryFlashList](https://twitter.com/naqvitalha/status/1574416547426496513)：在 React Native 中实现类似 Masonry/Pinterest 的网格布局
- 🥳️ [TypeScript 类型已在 v0.71 内置](https://twitter.com/thymikee/status/1572132314280300546)。不再需要额外安装 `@types/react-native`
- 🥳️ [React Native 周下载量突破 100 万次](https://twitter.com/thymikee/status/1574441040626552832)
- 🐦 [0.70 版本：堆栈跟踪显著优化](https://twitter.com/thymikee/status/1568257655323475972)
- 🎨 [Amazon Interactive Video Service 演示](https://twitter.com/nightstomp/status/1572576326934208513)：React Native 性能优于 TikTok？
- 🎨 [Software Mansion - 共享元素过渡 + Reanimated 预览演示](https://twitter.com/swmansion/status/1572246971829608449)
- 📜 [使用 React Native Testing Library 测试 WebView](https://coolsoftware.dev/testing-react-native-webview-with-react-native-testing-library/)

segments.source_content: ## 🧑‍💻 Jobs {#jobs}
🧑‍💼 [**G2i - 100% Remote React Native Jobs**](https://twitter.com/gabe_g2i/status/1563204813881425926?s=20&t=ArRLC77BpRwXXCdx8fnUqw)

We have several roles open for developers focused on React Native! Pay is ~160k plus 10% bonus. You must have production experience with RN and be based in the US. DM [@gabe_g2i](https://twitter.com/gabe_g2i) to learn more and don't forget to mention This Week in React.

translations.fr: Nous avons plusieurs postes ouverts pour des développeurs spécialisés en React Native ! La rémunération est d'environ 160k plus 10% de bonus. Vous devez avoir une expérience en production avec RN et être basé aux États-Unis. Envoyez un DM à [@gabe_g2i](https://twitter.com/gabe_g2i) pour en savoir plus et n'oubliez pas de mentionner This Week in React.
translations.en: Nous avons plusieurs postes ouverts pour des développeurs spécialisés en React Native ! La rémunération est d'environ 160k plus 10% de bonus. Vous devez avoir une expérience en production avec RN et être basé aux États-Unis. Envoyez un DM à [@gabe_g2i](https://twitter.com/gabe_g2i) pour en savoir plus et n'oubliez pas de mentionner This Week in React.
translations.zh-hans: 我们开放多个 React Native 开发职位！年薪约 16 万美元外加 10% 奖金。需具备 React Native 生产环境经验且位于美国境内。私信 [@gabe_g2i](https://twitter.com/gabe_g2i) 了解详情，并请注明来自 This Week in React。

segments.source_content: 💡 [How to publish an offer ?](https://thisweekinreact.com/sponsor)
## 🔀 Other {#other}

- [Qwik and Qwik City have reached beta!](https://www.builder.io/blog/qwik-and-qwik-city-have-reached-beta): cutting-edge framework, React challenger based on resumability instead of hydration
- [TypeScript 4.9 beta](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/typescript/announcing-typescript-4-9-beta/): new feature `satisfies` highly anticipated!
- [Token CSS](https://twitter.com/tokencss/status/1571823928187633664): possible alternative to Tailwind?
- [Updates from the 92nd TC39 meeting](https://dev.to/hemanth/updates-from-the-92nd-tc39-meeting-5fi6): small update
- [Cloudflare - workerd: the Open Source Workers runtime](https://blog.cloudflare.com/workerd-open-source-workers-runtime/)
- [Meta - MemLab: An open source framework for finding JavaScript memory leaks](https://engineering.fb.com/2022/09/12/open-source/memlab/)
- [Type-Level TypeScript](https://type-level-typescript.com/)
- TotalTypeScript [Tips](https://www.totaltypescript.com/tips) + [Zod tutorial](https://www.totaltypescript.com/tutorials/zod)
- [Ezno, new type-checking compiler for JavaScript](https://twitter.com/robpalmer2/status/1573244310644199425)
- [Turborepo 1.5](https://twitter.com/turborepo/status/1573017581459488769)
- [tRPC 10 beta](https://twitter.com/alexdotjs/status/1571807618254905344)
- [2022 Web Almanac](https://almanac.httparchive.org/en/2022/)
- [Chrome Developers - Container queries begin to land in stable browsers](https://developer.chrome.com/blog/cq-polyfill/)
- [WebKit Features in Safari 16.0](https://webkit.org/blog/13152/webkit-features-in-safari-16-0/)
- [Best practices for creating a modern npm package](https://snyk.io/blog/best-practices-create-modern-npm-package/)
